post:
At [ob.scured.net](http://ob.scured.net) we aim to provide hosting in "exotic" locations for a international community. We maybe newly baked but will do our best to provide perhaps more "unusual" service locations to a reasonable price. Because we are new we promise a _3days money back_ guarantee.

TR-256
Harddisk: 10GB
Memory: 256MB RAM
CPU: 1 Core
IP: 1IPv4 (no native IPv6 sorry)
Bandwidth: 100GB/m
Turkey
Normal price $7.95
With coupon **$6.36** (LEBPROMO)
[Order!](https://ob.scured.net/whmcs/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)


Ping: 188.132.228.82 (TR)
Test file: [10mb](http://ob.scured.net/10mb.test)
[WHMCS verified](http://www.whmcs.com/members/verifydomain.php) (enter ob.scured.net)

rDNS can be changed on request.

We rent colo in Russia, and Turkey. Payments via PayPal or LibertyReserve.
